event.title: Tableau Server Online Course Overview
event.description:
Tableau Server is an online solution for sharing, distributing, and collaborating on content created in Tableau. Tableau Server (Shareable) users can create workbooks and views, dashboards, and data sources in Tableau Desktop, and then publish this content to the server. Tableau Server (Secure) site and server administrators control who has access to server content to help protect sensitive data. Administrators can set user permissions on projects, workbooks, views, and data sources. Tableau Server (Mobile) Users can see and interact with the most up-to-date server content from anywhere, whether they use a browser or mobile device.
